price: 22. Maalintay arki malaa’igta7 uma ahaan doonto farxad Maalintaas denbiilayaasha, waxayna (malaa’igtu) odhan:“Waa wax idinka xarriman (jannada) oo gebigeedaba idinka reebban8.
arabic: يَوۡمَ يَرَوۡنَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ لَا بُشۡرَىٰ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ وَيَقُولُونَ حِجۡرٗا مَّحۡجُورٗا
footnotes:
7. Waqtiga dhimashadooda. 
8. Ma jiro war san iyo wanaag oo dhan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yawma yarawna al-malāikata lā bush'rā yawma-idhin lil'muj'rimīna wayaqūlūna ḥij'ran maḥjūran
